voidscape.skills.generic.voidic_bond.des: Skills beyond this tree strengthen various stats
voidscape.skills.generic.spellpower.desc: Spellpower increases spell damage by a % amount
Recharge Rate increases the speed at which you gain Voidic Power
voidscape.skills.generic.spell_dex.desc: Reduces the time it takes to reuse an ability by a percentage
voidscape.skills.generic.astute_understa: Reduces the Power cost of abilities by a percentage
voidscape.skills.generic.voidic_damage.d: Deal extra Voidic Damage on melee attacks
voidscape.skills.generic.voidic_hamp.des: Increases the amount of healing you take from all spirces by a percentage
Decreases the amount of Voidic Damage taken
voidscape.skills.mage.core.title: Void Arcanist
voidscape.skills.mage.insane_mage_1.desc:
Embrace insanity, empowering yourself
Your voidic spells directly convert their raw cost into an Insanity guage, maxed out at 1000. The spells must have dealt damage to be considered.
Insanity Guage decays at a rate of 1 per 10 ticks, this is static, nothing slows it down.
voidscape.skills.mage.echo.title: Echo
voidscape.skills.mage.echo.desc: Screech out in front of you, enemies within a frontal cone of you are dealt 2 Voidic damage
voidscape.skills.mage.traumatize.title: Traumatize
voidscape.skills.mage.traumatize.desc: Your target is dealt 1 Voidic damage every second for 20 seconds
voidscape.skills.mage.voidmancy_1.title: Voidmancy I
voidscape.skills.mage.homingbolts.title: Homing Bolts
voidscape.skills.mage.homingbolts.desc: While toggled on, Bolts will now actively seek out targets
voidscape.skills.mage.voidicaura.title: Voidic Aura
voidscape.skills.mage.voidicaura.desc: Create an aura around you that deals 1 Voidic Damage every (30 - recharge rate) ticks (min 1 tick)
voidscape.skills.mage.voidmancy_2.title: Voidmancy II
voidscape.skills.mage.voidmancy_2.desc: Base Bolt Damage is increased to 2
voidscape.skills.mage.voidmancy_3.title: Voidmancy III
voidscape.skills.mage.voidmancy_3.desc: Base Bolt Damage is increased to 3
voidscape.skills.mage.voidmancy_4.title: Voidmancy IV
voidscape.skills.mage.voidmancy_4.desc: Base Bolt Damage is increased to 4
voidscape.skills.mage.voidmancy_5.title: Voidmancy V
voidscape.skills.mage.voidmancy_5.desc: Base Bolt Damage is increased to 5
voidscape.skills.mage.voidic_archer_1.de: Bows you wield now deal 25% extra damage as Voidic damage
voidscape.skills.mage.arrowimbue_spellli: The Voidic Damage on arrows you fire now scale with spell power
voidscape.skills.mage.flameshot.title: Flame Shot
voidscape.skills.tank.core.title: Ethereal Sentinel
voidscape.skills.tank.insane_beast_1.des: While wielding an axe, any Voidic Damage you deal and take will increase your Insane guage
voidscape.skills.tank.adrenaline.title: Adrenaline
voidscape.skills.tank.tunnel_vision.desc:
Hyper focus on your target
All damage dealt and taken from the target double the amount of insane guage converted
+10% increased threat on target
voidscape.skills.tank.bulwark.title: Bulwark
voidscape.skills.tank.shout.title: Shout
voidscape.skills.tank.shout.desc:
Yell out in a cone infront of you
All targets are dealt 1 Voidic Damage
Damaged targets have +25% threat applied
voidscape.skills.tank.tactician_1.title: Tactician I
voidscape.skills.tank.tactician_1.desc:
While blocking with a shield, absorb 10% Voidic Damage
The full 100% of Voidic damage blocked before reduction will convert into Null Power
Unequipping a shield resets Null Power to 0
voidscape.skills.tank.empower_shield_2x_: The next attack you block within 5 seconds will give double the null power
voidscape.skills.tank.backstep.title: Backstep
voidscape.skills.tank.tactician_2.title: Tactician II
voidscape.skills.tank.tactician_3.title: Tactician III
voidscape.skills.tank.tactician_4.title: Tactician IV
voidscape.skills.tank.tactician_5.title: Tactician V
voidscape.skills.melee.core.title: Hollow Gladiator
voidscape.skills.melee.chaos_blade_1.des:
While wielding an axe you gain an Insane Guage
Dealing damage converts the Voidic damage into Insane Power
Insane Power drains at a rate of 1 every 10 ticks
Unequipping an Axe resets the gauge to 0
voidscape.skills.melee.empower_attack_bl:
Your next attack within 5 seconds applies bleed
Target is dealt 1 Voidic Damage every second for 15 seconds
voidscape.skills.melee.sense_weakness.de: Deal 50% more Voidic damage to target for 15 seconds
voidscape.skills.melee.empower_attack_sl:
Your next attack within 5 seconds applies bleed
Target is dealt 1 Voidic Damage every second for 10 seconds
voidscape.skills.melee.tempest_1.title: Tempest I
voidscape.skills.melee.cleave.title: Cleave
voidscape.skills.melee.cleave.desc:
Perform a Sweeping Edge attack that deals damage as Voidic, the damage isn't increased as a normal Sweeping Edge would
You can use this ability while your actual weapon isn't fully charged
voidscape.skills.melee.tempest_2.title: Tempest II
voidscape.skills.melee.tempest_3.title: Tempest III
voidscape.skills.melee.tempest_4.title: Tempest IV
voidscape.skills.melee.tempest_5.title: Tempest V
voidscape.skills.healer.core.title: Soul Mender
voidscape.skills.healer.mad_priest_1.des: Any health you restore converts into Insane Power
voidscape.skills.healer.mend.title: Mend
voidscape.skills.healer.mend.desc: Target within a 1 block distance is healed for 2 hearts
voidscape.skills.healer.mind_warp.title: Mind Warp
voidscape.skills.healer.mind_warp.desc:
Target is inflicted with madness
Target takes half a heart in damage every second for 10 seconds
voidscape.skills.healer.healing_bolt.des: Launch a bolt that heals the target on impact for 1 heart
voidscape.skills.healer.healing_blast.de: Launch a bolt that explodes on impact healing all around for half a heart
voidscape.skills.healer.voids_favor_1.de:
While wielding a sword, melee Voidic damage you deal is converted to Null Power
Unequipping a sword resets null power back to 0
voidscape.skills.healer.healing_aura.des: For a short time, you and your allies around you are healed for half a heart every second, scales with Spellpower
voidscape.skills.healer.empower_sword_os: Your next melee attack within 10 seconds will give back 150 Voidic Power
voidscape.abilities.mage.bolt.title: Voidic Bolt
voidscape.abilities.mage.bolt.desc: Fire a Bolt of Voidic energy towards a target
voidscape.abilities.mage.aura.title: Voidic Aura
voidscape.abilities.mage.aura.desc: Deals damage around you every (30 - recharge rate) ticks, minimum of once per tick, for 30 seconds
voidscape.abilities.mage.arrow_imbue_spe: The Voidic Damage on arrows you fire now scale with spell power
voidscape.abilities.mage.flame_shot.desc:
Your next arrow will deal 25% (100% if target is on fire) extra damage as fire damage
25% to set target on fire
voidscape.abilities.tank.taunt.title: Taunt
voidscape.abilities.tank.taunt.desc: Provoke a target, causing them to attack you instead
voidscape.abilities.melee.rush.title: Rush
voidscape.abilities.melee.rush.desc: Rush towards a target, dealing damage to them and all around on impact
While in a Duty, resurrect a fallen ally
